snippet: Ratepayers have sued Southern California Edison Co. and state electric power regulators for $3 billion in federal court over allegations the defendants have illegally collected millions in monthly electric bills from more than 17 million customers...

headline.print_headline: Ratepayers File Suit Over California Nuclear Plant
headline.main: Ratepayers File Suit Over California Nuclear Plant

lead_paragraph: Ratepayers have sued Southern California Edison Co. and state electric power regulators for $3 billion in federal court over allegations the defendants have illegally collected millions in monthly electric bills from more than 17 million customers since a nuclear power plant was shuttered last year.
